sentences.en: Brian pulled the straps through the buckles of his suitcase.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩将带子穿过自己手提箱的带扣。

sentences.en: He felt two men wrench the suitcase from his hand.
sentences.cn: 他感觉有两个人在使劲拽他手里的手提箱。

sentences.en: He picked up his suitcase and climbed the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他拎起手提箱,爬上了楼梯.

sentences.en: He was piling clothes into the suitcase.
sentences.cn: 他在把衣服一件件叠放进手提箱中。

sentences.en: He wrested the suitcase from the chauffeur.
sentences.cn: 他从司机手里抢过手提箱。

sentences.en: It did not take Andrew long to pack a suitcase.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁没有用多长时间就整理好了手提箱。

sentences.en: My clothes won't all go into that tiny suitcase.
sentences.cn: 那个小衣箱装不下我所有的衣物.

sentences.en: She grabbed his suitcase and led the way.
sentences.cn: 她拿过他的箱子在前面带路。

sentences.en: She methodically put the things into her suitcase.
sentences.cn: 她把物品井然有序地放进了箱子。

sentences.en: She was struggling with a heavy suitcase.
sentences.cn: 她正费力地拎着一只沉重的手提箱。

sentences.en: Somehow the suitcase with my clothes was misplaced.
sentences.cn: 不知怎的，我忘了把装衣服的箱子放到哪里去了。

sentences.en: The man took her suitcase from her and then searched her.
sentences.cn: 那名男子拿过她手中的提箱，然后对她搜身。

sentences.en: The suitcase liner is a piece of soft cloth.
sentences.cn: 箱子的衬里是一块很软的布.

sentences.en: The suitcase was light to carry, being empty except for two shirts.
sentences.cn: 这只箱子提着很轻, 因为里面只有两件衬衣.

sentences.en: This suitcase looks heavy but actually it is very light.
sentences.cn: 这个皮箱看上去很重,实际上很轻.

trans.tran_en: a large case with a handle, used for carrying clothes and possessions when you travel
